name: Grant Mod V2 (PLAYTESTING)
description:
This is the playtesting page for Grant Mod V2. When the demo is finished, Grant Mod V2's main page will be made separately.

Despite being a mod, Grant Mod V2 functions as a standalone game and does not require Bebder Game, the original game it uses as a base, as a prerequisite for playing.

Apart from that there really isn't anything I can put here. I'm literally the one making this godawful game and even I can't describe it.

Discord: https://discord.gg/H7WXKYuBG5
